news.title: 意大利冬奥会开幕日铁路遭“严重破坏”
news.title0: Italy says railways hit by 'serious sabotage' as Winter Olympics begin
news.content: 意大利北部铁路网络在冬奥会开幕日遭疑似蓄意破坏，导致严重交通中断，当局称事件与巴黎奥运会期间破坏行为相似。
news.content0: Suspected attacks on northern Italy's railway network have led to severe travel disruption in the region, the authorities say, as thousands gathered for the start of the Winter Olympic Games.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 法国前文化部长因与爱泼斯坦关联受调查
news.title0: France investigates ex-minister Jack Lang over Epstein links
news.content: 法国金融犯罪检察官对前文化部长杰克·朗展开初步调查，因其与已故性犯罪者杰弗里·爱泼斯坦存在关联，涉嫌洗钱。
news.content0: Financial crime prosecutors in France say they have opened a preliminary inquiry into former Culture Minister Jack Lang over his links to Jeffrey Epstein.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 伦敦新泳池开业六周即关闭引众怒
news.title0: Frustration as new pool closes weeks after opening
news.content: 伦敦南部一非营利游泳俱乐部称，因新建市政泳池开业仅六周便因维护问题关闭，俱乐部每月损失约500英镑，会员流失。
news.content0: A not-for-profit swimming club in south London says it is losing about £500 a month after a brand new council pool closed six weeks after opening.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 布里斯班公布23亿澳元奥运主场馆设计
news.title0: Plans for $2.3 billion stadium ignite debate in 2032 Olympics host city
news.content: 澳大利亚布里斯班公布2032年奥运会主场馆设计，耗资23亿澳元，灵感源自当地“昆士兰”式住宅，但选址遗产公园引发争议。
news.content0: Officials in Brisbane, Australia, have revealed plans for 2032’s Olympic stadium: a $2.3 billion venue inspired by the state’s typical suburban homes, known as “Queenslanders” — residential architecture that may be familiar to fans of Brisbane-based cartoon, “Bluey.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: 全球最贵大米：一盒售价73美元
news.title0: This is the world’s most expensive rice. But what does it taste like?
news.content: 日本“Kinmemai Premium”大米获吉尼斯世界纪录认证为全球最贵，每年仅产1000盒，每盒售价约73美元，其酶活力和风味被严格筛选。
news.content0: In travel news this week: the world’s most expensive rice, trouble at Rome’s Trevi Fountain, plus how the hotel bathroom door situation has gotten out of hand.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 韩国生育率罕见回升，危机能否逆转？
news.title0: South Korea is finally having more babies. But can it last?
news.content: 韩国生育率在持续暴跌多年后出现罕见回升，政府投入巨资鼓励生育的政策初见成效，但长期趋势仍待观察。
news.content0: Excited young couples roam a bustling convention center trying on baby carriers, testing strollers and learning the latest safety features of car seats.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 巴基斯坦清真寺遭炸弹袭击致31死
news.title0: A Mosque Bombing Undercuts Pakistan’s Bid for Security
news.content: 巴基斯坦伊斯兰堡一什叶派清真寺遭自杀式炸弹袭击，造成至少31人死亡、169人受伤，极端组织“伊斯兰国”宣称负责。
news.content0: In recent years, Pakistan has arrested, jailed or killed dozens of Islamic State militants along its border with Afghanistan. It was praised as a “phenomenal partner” by a U.S. official after extraditing the suspected plotter of a 2021 attack in Kabul, the Afghan capital, that killed 13 Americans.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 沙特宣布对叙利亚进行大规模投资
news.title0: Saudis Announce New Investments in Syria, a Sign of Deepening Ties
news.content: 沙特阿拉伯宣布对叙利亚电信、能源和航空领域进行大规模投资，标志着两国关系在叙利亚战后重建中进一步深化。
news.content0: Saudi Arabia announced on Saturday sweeping investments in Syria’s telecommunications, energy, and aviation sectors, the latest sign of a deepening relationship between the two countries.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 加拿大渔民冰钓捕获244磅大比目鱼创纪录
news.title0: 6 Fishermen Reel In a 244-Pound Atlantic Halibut, Setting a Local Record
news.content: 加拿大魁北克省六名渔民在冰封河面上，经过长时间努力，成功捕获一条重达244磅的大西洋大比目鱼，创下当地纪录。
news.content0: It was minus 4 degrees Fahrenheit and a wind was cutting across the ice as six men took turns wrangling a fishing line as they stood on a frozen river in the Canadian province of Quebec.
news.author: NYTimes
